extendedInfo.description: DIA is the official app of Doha International Airport and offers comprehensive information on flights, shopping and dining as well as other facilities.-	Flight information (Arrivals, Departures)-	Flight status-	Airline information -	Information on terminals, shopping and promotions, dining, lounges and other facilities at the airport-	Navigation-	Contact detailsWe will be continually upgrading the application so please check back often for new and improved features.Please send your feedback to DIAmobile@qatarairways.com.qa

reviews.comment: So happy that dia have an app!
reviews.author: liz walsh
